mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_bbs(user_id, title, content, display_date, read_cnt, interest, reg_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{display_date}, #{read_cnt}, #{interest}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT idx, user_id, title, content, display_date, read_cnt, reg_date, modify_date, interest FROM tbl_bbs ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_bbs SET user_id = #{user_id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, display_date = #{display_date}, interest = #{interest}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE idx=#{idx}
